unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Yay or Nay? Are they actually helpful, yaar?**
normalised: Okay, so like, everyone and their uncle are pushing these exam prep apps these days. I'm prepping for the J E E exam (fingers crossed for I I T Delhi!), and I'm drowning in ads for Byju's, Vedantu, and a gazillion others. Are they actually worth the hype… and the subscription fees? My parents are already yelling at me for spending too much time on my phone, so I need to convince them these apps are for study!

unnormalised: Okay, so like, everyone and their uncle are pushing these exam prep apps these days. normalised: I've tried a couple. One promised "guaranteed success" if I did their daily practice at seven P M. Another one was all about "gamified learning" – which basically meant I was playing Candy Crush with physics problems (still failed the mock test, by the way). Honestly, sometimes I feel like just sticking to N C E R T textbooks and past papers like good old Ramesh uncle suggests. He aced his U P S C exam back in nineteen eighty five, old school style!
